title: RecordData
description: Data schema for importing metadata into ADS pipeline

createdTime.description: Timestamp for when the metadata was harvested (e.g. file created timestamp)

loadType.description: ENUM: do we get this from a file or from a URL (or other?)
loadType.$comment: This list may need to be expanded.

loadFormat.$comment: This list may need to be expanded.

loadLocation.description: If loadtype is fromFile, path to file; if fromURL, it's a URL

masterRecord.description: Canonical record identifier with which this object is associated

recordOrigin.description: Provider of record (e.g. Publisher, STI, arXiv)

UUID.description: Internal identifier UUID for this object
